column5: Classic Heights Bungalow great for getting to know real Houston living. Close to great restaurants, nightlife, music venues and The Heights Hike and Bike Trail. Tranquil neighborhood that is great for adventure or family and pet friendly stays. Casual dining to fine dining all in the neighborhood plus 5.2 miles from Downtown and more....
column8: Casa 424- Quaint Bungalow in the Heights
